Package org.texgen.utils

Contains utility class to be used in textures and signals

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ColorGradient Class which contains a list of colors and methods to interpolate through the colors based on a value from 0 to 1
Gradient Gradient contains static functions that can be used to interpolate values and colors.
GraphUtils Some utility functions for clamping values, and calculating sine values and distances
ImprovedNoise  
PerlinNoise Class for creating noise values based on Ken Perlin's idea for Perlin Noise.
RGBAColor Class representing colors using Red,Green,Blue and Alpha values.
TerrainTexture Helper class that contains some useful terrain textures and also combines them into a terrain texture to produce a textured terrain based on the textures defined here.
 

Package org.texgen.utils Description

Contains utility class to be used in textures and signals
